title: mATADa rAdA
sahitya:
mATADa rAdA vEmaru konna nAtO


anupallavi

  cinna nATanuNTi ninnE neranammina nannu brOci ikanu


caraNam 1    nA sarivAralu nanukani navu cuNTaga jUci rOsamu rAlEdA shrI rukmiNIsha nEDu 
bhUsuranuta munu gajamunu brOvu rIti gOpAladAsuni rakSinceDi daivamu nIvanihau sukha
    caraNam 2    ninnu vinA dikkevarani niratamu moraliDagA nanniTu raccala beTTuDa nyAyamA nIku 
bhinnaga dayajUDa nintabiDaiya mEla ikanA vinnapamula nAlakunci vETka mIra nannu jUci
    caraNam 3    brOcEnani pujjakinci ponkulATu cunDEdi kUcEvAralakellanu shulakatanamu gAdA 
Eshu guNamu cAlinci ika nApai dayayunci gAcEnani caicAci karuNaloluka nannu jUci
